website_summaries.verdict: The Philips Sonicare for Kids is a Bluetooth-connected toothbrush that helps parents and children keep track of oral hygiene with a well-designed app.
pros: Parents can track child's brushing habits and create reminders
cons: Potential to get connected phone or tablet wet

customer_reviews.title: Dont last long
customer_reviews.text: This is our third one, we have two boys. They dont last very long. I was smart enough to get the warranty on the last one i bought, and even after being replaced, the replacement didnt last long.
customer_reviews.author: fullhouse4

customer_reviews.title: Kids use this everyday. Battery great.
customer_reviews.text: When the time arrives to brush teeth, any parent will attest to how difficult it is to get a toddler to cooperate in that post meal ritual. Since buying this toothbrush (and accompanying toddler born step-up to the sink) I literally never have a night where my daughter doesn't cooperate fully. She'd let me brush her teeth for 5 minutes straight with this if I chose to (though we usually keep it to around 60 seconds). Because it's a Sonicare you know it is doing a good job too. I couldn't recommend this more highly.
customer_reviews.author: jmn27

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Great clean and the customization is great...but the brush head is huge for a kid. Kids brush head is on the left (in my photo), adult sonicare on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Lakopp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and effective so far!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has been asking for a sonicare like mom and dad's and was so excited to receive this- I've already had to tell him to stop brushing his teeth so much :) Came completely factory sealed as expected with everything inside. The app works very well and had no problem immediately connecting to Bluetooth. Will update if we have any issues down the road. It comes with a 2 year warranty plus if you register online you get an additional 6 mos. (2.5 years total). Registering was quick and easy also!
customer_reviews.author: C2

customer_reviews.title: It worked ok for a month then the motor turned ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok for a month then the motor turned into fierce side. Too late to return and no ‘contact seller’ window. It gets too strong even with softer mode, my child got scared and switched to old-style toothbrush. We bought toothbrush not power brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kuma mom

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Experience
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to give this toothbrush to my daughter. It arrived late yesterday. To my dismay, the box had been opened, taped back shut (kinda), and looked like it had been used to wipe a cow's rear end. Absolutely no excuse for this. Horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: CWJI

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Design, Gets Moldy, Lasted Less Than a Year - Just Buy Regular Sonicare
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for me 5 year old and it works intermittently now (it hums but doesn't move the brush then you have to play with the head to make it buzz again) and it has gotten moldy in places where the standard Sonicare (series 2) hasn't. I would have thought they would make it more resilient and better for children's use. I have not used the stickers which makes the mould situation worst. If I would have have bought it from a retailer I would have returned it. Philips very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Javed

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 4 year old upon my dentist's advice. I expected the toothbrush head to be smaller to navigate around the smaller teeth, but it's the same size as the adult's and very uncomfortable. Also why would anyone want to stick a BLUETOOTH device into a child's mouth????? Badly designed and irresponsible. Won't be using it.
customer_reviews.author: SDY

customer_reviews.title: Mold growing after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed in this toothbrush. I bought two and after only 4 months of use, one of them began growing mold on the handle. The return window has closed so I’m unable to request a refund or a new toothbrush. It’s so disappointing because I’ve been using a Philips Sonicare Series 2 toothbrush for years without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on 10/25/18 and it stopped working 2 days ago (less than 5 months). It still vibrates when I do not use it to brush my son's teeth, but when I press the toothbrush head, it stops. Now I cannot use it anymore, and I am not sure if it still has warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Mold Gold
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept and the kids really loved the app however after around a year there is some type of mold that won’t come off! We are not going to let them brush their teeth with it. The adult version didn’t do this so not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: The required App is horrible!
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great, but the required App is horrible. It looks like it was written by beginner app developers, and is guaranteed to make a parents life miserable. The App is prone to randomly lose a child's profile and all stored points. They aren't backed up anywhere so you've got to explain that to a kid. Let's not forget that there's a button on the main screen that will instantly delete a profile. The app also doesn't work properly with Android so if you leave it running it will deplete your battery over a few hours, while also helpfully rewarding brushing by giving kids virtual candy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED!!! Develop Mold
customer_reviews.text: We have this toothbrush for a month and a half and we keep it clean every day. After using it for a few weeks underneath the brush head it started to have mold. We have the adult version for the last 2 years and didn’t encounter this issue. NOT RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oren Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought one sooner
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure how my 7 year old would react to this toothbrush. He's leary of change and I thought he might freak out about the vibration and noise. I think the app REALLY helped with that by keeping him distracted. He's used it daily since receiving for Christmas and absolutely loves it. His teeth are definitely much cleaner overall. I wish I had purchased one sooner! I have a cheaper smaller round one for my 2 year old since he has to do everything his big brother does. Again, I wish I had thought of this sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni BTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts- AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: Total rip off and scam. Received today and the head is missing. There is even a space in the packaging for where the head goes. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlyg

customer_reviews.title: better check ups and fun!
customer_reviews.text: a great toothbrush and the kid loves the app with the silly character brushing its teeth along with us. the dentist recommended this to my older son and this is the second one I've gotten (now for the younger kid). we've gotten great reviews of less plaque from our check ups! This is easy to use, the app keeps kids focused and teaches them how to brush more effectively. parental assistance is needed for younger kids and/or to teach thorough brushing skills (sometimes the kids get zoned out by the app and forget to move the toothbrush). the kids love the stickers/skins and it's been a great tool. our older version is still going strong after 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ferfnstuff

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality, wont last
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than a year and is the second I had to buy. Not comparable to “adult” version of sonicare.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: No more fighting my kids to brush their teeth!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Philips Sonicare electric toothbrush for kids because it has a rechargeable battery and replaceable brush heads. Figured it would be better value for the money. And I was right! As an added bonus, it has different stickers for a customizable front so my kids can tell their toothbrushes apart. It also has an app you can download on your phone and Bluetooth to the toothbrush while they are brushing their teeth. Only downfall is they have to take turns or the Bluetooth won't pick up the individual toothbrushes. My children are ten and 2 1/2 and they are able to use the toothbrush independently!
customer_reviews.author: CorKatSuzMil

customer_reviews.title: Incredible and International!
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to this is the brushhead size looks like it's for an adult, not a child's mouth. (Or my child has a freakishly small mouth). Otherwise, inbetween the app and this brush has made my 4 year old now ASK to brush her teeth so she can play w/ her sparkly. The other cool aspect is that the app has several language packs. One of which is 日本語(Japanese). Very helpful for our household where we try to keep everything Japanese for immersion.
customer_reviews.author: Zsoldier

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush for kids ever!
customer_reviews.text: Let's be real, brushing your kids teeth is not the funnest thing, and mine usually whine a lot. But, it has to get done. Once we bought these, they actually run to the bathroom to brush, even the 4 year old! They love these brushes! Each child decorated their own, and the timer helps them focus on one area for the right amount of time. We just went to the dentist last week, and all 4 received another cavity-free check up. The hygienist said their teeth looked really clean and happy. I hope I don't have to buy another toothbrush for a long time, but if I do, it will be one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Wife&MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: good tooth brush
customer_reviews.text: this is second time I buy this toothbrush. this time is for my son. his ask me longtime. but before have not coupon. finally it have now . it still good.. but I think I spend to much money on Amazon this month. I need stop to look at Amazon com. it can help me save my money. but is little hard to me. is too much birthday party on this two months.. 😰😰😰😰
customer_reviews.author: Sujiazhao

customer_reviews.title: Brushing teeth is easy now!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has fought brushing his teeth his entire life. This tooth brush with bluetooth connectivity to the Sonicare app has been a game changer. Now we rarely have a struggle to get teeth brushed because he can't wait to play with Sparkly and see what treat or costume he will get for his Sparkly after brushing. We've been using it for about two months. I like that the vibration is lower than in the adult model and the handle and brush heads are covered in a silicone like material that reduces the loud uncomfortable vibrations if my son hits the back of the brush head to his teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Kksoprano

customer_reviews.title: Expensive toothbrush that didnt last long for us
customer_reviews.text: I had two boys using this toothbrush (9&12yrs old), they are not hard on toothbrushes. However, after about a year of on and off use this unit will still vibrate but once the brush head has any pressure on it it doesn't work. I bought new brush heads in hopes that somehow it would help, it didn't. I don't think one year is long enough for a product of this nature to work, especially at $40. I'm very disappointing in Sonicare and won't buy another. I would save your money and choose another product.
customer_reviews.author: B. WilliamsonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: No cons! 😁
customer_reviews.text: Great Toothbrush! My 6 year old son is on the spectrum, and this really helped him grow to get used to, and almost LIKE getting his teeth brushed! My 3 year old daughter may not be on the spectrum, but she HATED getting her teeth brushed until now. She absolutely loves feeding and petting the "SPARKLY" in the application that goes with the Toothbrush! The design of giving a present of food or different items to dress up the "sparkly" is really a genius idea. Makes them excited to brush their teeth so they can get the present. I honestly can't say enough good things about this Toothbrush! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Saw101710

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: We had this a little over a year, and it still makes noise but the part that vibrates with the brush head on it no longer works right, it barely moves and not enough to brush anymore. I will buy another and see how we do. We are very gentle with it and keep it in a safe place, no reason for it to break like that. We will get the service plan this time around, you should too.
customer_reviews.author: ColeMc3

customer_reviews.title: Completely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I chose it for my little one because all the other three persons In my family is using this brand, but it disappeared me completely. I got it on Dec 27th, about one month later the voice when you using it began to weird, I just thought maybe the brush-head was broken, after I changed the head It still could not work normally. Now it can shake lightly when you hold it in your hand, but can’t shaking when you put it in your mouth,When my husband reminded me to return it last week, it showed that My return period deadline is January 31st. So....
customer_reviews.author: Zengli Guo

customer_reviews.title: Great Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush but the app moves way too fast and frustrates my 7 year old trying to keep up. The timer is a bit different from my Diamond Care so trying to teach him while we do it together is a bit frustrating. This toothbrush does 15 secs in 4 sections for a total of 1 minute. The Diamond Care does 20 secs in 6 sections for a total of 2 minutes. Maybe they want to keep things simple for kids but I prefer he work in 6 sections than 4.
customer_reviews.author: Genny

customer_reviews.title: Recieved a completely USED toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty embarrassing for me because I got this for my niece's 6th birthday. She opened the package late last night to brush her teeth and was so disappointed to find that it was not in new condition. My sister reached out to me and I was furious... Even though I contacted Amazon customer service and they refunded me, it was still embarrassing to go through that experience. Make sure you check inside the box before gifting it!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Great reports from the dentist since kids started using it
customer_reviews.text: I have two kids (aged 11 and 9) - they both have access to iOS devices, the app that pairs with the toothbrush really helped teach my kids HOW to brush properly, and what the timer feature is intended for. My older kid was on a 4-month recall schedule with the dentist due to poor gum health. Since we started using this brush, he's back on the standard 6-month schedule. My younger kid has had only good reports since he started using it at a younger age. Replacement heads are easy to come by at club stores and on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love sonicare and we have used sonicare for years. However, in this recent order the cover plate that goes over the buttons was missing. Very weird. And it’s not like I can return the item because, you know, we need to brush our teeth. So we are just going without it. So buyer beware, and have back up toothbrushes ready to go in case you have to return your item for a missing plate. Lesson learned for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy kids replacement heads to make it a kids toothbrush?
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it works great but unfortunately cannot use it at the moment. I was saddened when the “children’s toothbrush” arrived it had an adult sized head and the children’s size u have to buy separate. Makes absolutely no sense at all. Very disappointed in that. I understand the description says standard size but it’s a child’s toothbrush so normally that would mean standard child size. Other than that I’ve read nothing but good reviews so I’m looking forward to using it at some point on my son.
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Super happy I spent the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 2 year old who HATED getting his teeth brushed. He actually enjoyed the sonicare kids toothbrush and was giggling because of the vibration. Absolutely recommend buying the sold separately kids head which is much smaller for little mouths. The brush is so quiet you cannot even tell that it’s on, which is awesome so it didn’t freak him out. Two different settings; one for older kids and one extra gentle for younger children. Stickers are adorable as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for little ones and teens!
customer_reviews.text: My 7, 12 and 13 year olds all have 1! They all 3 love it! I was worried that it wasn't going to work for my older ones because they have adult teeth, but it does! I'm so happy I caught it on sale! My 7 yr old hated brushing his teeth before we got this. NOW he begs to brush them so he can play with his "sparklee". I was also worried about how it works with braces and it works just fine! Yay for cleaner, happier teeth and gums! And my 12 year likes the app too lol
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Maitland

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice if it worked longer than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I’m reviewing this product a little late because I honestly couldn’t find it in my orders. But today it popped up in my “want to buy again” section. My 8 yr old daughter LOVED this toothbrush, for the 3 months that it actually worked. :( It broke and stopped vibrating soon after she began using it so she used it as a manual toothbrush after that. It was highly disappointing and we threw it in the trash after we found her a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bisesi

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tooth brush!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves this! The tooth brush connects easily to the app on my phone and it helps here see where and how to brush her teeth. The timer is great. The battery life is pretty good, it chargers up quick and lasts. I wish I had bought this for her sooner! The only thing I didn’t like was putting the stickers on. I could get get it to line up perfectly, bothers me but not my kid, so whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Less than A Year!
customer_reviews.text: Initially we loved this toothbrush, our son adored the kids app and settings. He especially loved the decals. However it started shorting out, so we went to change the brush head and the entire thing broke off. I was hoping to get a full year at the very least! Very disappointed that it only lasted a short while.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: 2 years max
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for 2 years, then peters out despite regularly keeping it clean and intermittent charging as suggested in the manual. Interactive app is interesting at first, but then just becomes entertainment. More often then not, I find my kid watching the little critter brush it's teeth with glassy TV eyes while keeping their own toothbrush in one spot. Not sold that this actually helps kids brush better - but maybe if you struggle with your kid getting the brushing done at all or if it's a fight to brush, this might ease that a bit. In the end, I think the regular sonicate is fine - no gimmicks and it lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if i wanted to spend the money on a toothbrush like this for my 8 year old son, but this one was worth it. He is a little old for the app, but still uses it and it helped him get in the habit of brushing correctly (or at least better than before!). The timer and different options as well as the parental controls on the app are excellent. Worth the money if you are going the electric toothbrush route for your kid.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Acosta

customer_reviews.title: hurts feelings of kids who live in two homes
customer_reviews.text: the little cartoon guys get disappointed if you skip a day of brushing. my kids are at their other parent’s house several days each week, so when they come back, their cartoon guys shame them. both of my kids (8yo & 10yo) find the vibration WAY too powerful. it’s so uncomfortable they refuse to use it, now that the cartoon guys lost their novelty
customer_reviews.author: moMaven

customer_reviews.title: Works for adults too and better than adult versions
customer_reviews.text: Bought many of these for family and friends (grownups and kids alike). They work just as well as the adult versions and are far cheaper. They actually last far longer than my Diamond-Clean (motor bearing, seal seemed to crap out). I use replacement brushheads by Sonic Fresh which are sometime less than $1 each and fit snuggly. Not sure what the Bluetooth feature is for though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the for both my daughters back on Dec. 5th, 2018 now, 4 months later my daughters does not work at all. She turns on the power button and sometimes it makes a noise and no vibration otherwise it doesn't turn on. While trying to return this product or reach out to the company I was informed that the return eligibility has been closed. As a company I would want my customers satisfied with all products and offer nay solutions to help.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Large brush head
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toothbrush with sticks that your child can use to decorate their toothbrush with. But, the brush head seems very large for a child. I have an adult sonicare and the brush is smaller on mine than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 for my kids. They have been a lifesaver! Brushing teeth was a battle, especially for my son. The app associated with these toothbrushes had made it so much fun for my kids. Plus, my daughter had yellow stains on her front teeth. We used the cheaper character electronic toothbrushes, but they never did the trick. Within a couple weeks of using SonicareKids, no more stains!
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: Pink 10$ more than blue...give me a good reason why
customer_reviews.text: Can you please tell me why the pink is 10$ more than the blue???!! Women have to pay double everything that is cheaper for men, underwear, deodorant, whatever is tailored towards females is doubled the price then it would be for a male. Women get paid less then men for doing the same job and now apparently our daughters who wants the pink toothbrush has to pay 10$ more too. Thanks so much cooperate America.
customer_reviews.author: leolani Espaniola

customer_reviews.title: 50% failure rate in year 1... but 2 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these about a year ago. One is starting to malfunction with intermittent vibrations. I noticed on the box that there is a two year manufacturer’s warranty on the product, so I will be filing a claim for the malfunctioning brush. I am hopeful that Philips Sonicare will replace the malfunctioning brush handle. Prior to malfunctioning, the brush has worked well (aside from some Bluetooth connection glitches when more than 1 brush is in range). Also, the toothbrush head is REALLY large for small mouths. I’ve found another brand’s children size heads on Amazon that are compatible and work well.
customer_reviews.author: O Piper5679

customer_reviews.title: Great electric toothbrushes for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my 9 and 10 year old children. The kids do a much more thorough job when brushing with these, and the timer makes sure that they brush long enough. We don't have the kids use the Bluetooth, but my wife can monitor their brushing by using it on her phone. The kids like the stickers that come with them to customize it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Schnittman

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: I always like electric toothbrushes, so I bought a cute electric toothbrush for my son. Since my child used it, I started to brush my teeth seriously. It can be linked to the iPad or mobile phone app. It is really interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: I was worried our kids would not like the feeling of the ultrasonic toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I was worried our kids would not like the feeling of the ultrasonic toothbrushes, especially our one kiddo with sensory processing (avoidant) issues and an extremely strong gag reflex. Much to my pleasant surprise, both kids took to these brushes right away and brush longer thanks to the little tune the brush plays at the end of the brushing time. Great purchase. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Tebault

customer_reviews.title: Made brushing much easier
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been fans of Sonicare for years so when our son turned four, we decided to get this for him. The cute little app has made brushing time so much more enjoyable now that he wants to play with his sparklie. Now he reminds us that it’s time to brush his teeth and he only had one time spot of plaque at his last dentist visit. I’d definitely recommend getting the smaller brush head replacements if you’re also buying this for a younger child.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Meek

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old loves this toothbrush!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this toothbrush. Seriously, I’m mad at myself for not buying it sooner. My son loves using the app with it and gets to see how long he really needs to brush each quadrant. Tooth brushing was just horrible these past few months and I guess you could say it was like pulling teeth Hahaha. But he’s so proud to use this one! It’s reasonable price-wise, and a trusted brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. Had this toothbrush for several months now and cannot complain about it what so ever. We don’t use the Bluetooth anymore we did for a few days/weeks maybe it’s a cute thought some children maybe into it were just not technology people. We use this for a 3 and 6 year old and they love them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Brush to perfection.
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush has handsome blue color and the ability to customize it with stickers that hold extremely well with all the contact with water. My kid loves the app that comes with it and pretty much the dentist's check up have been a breeze since the first time. It's been 5 years since we bought the first one, and just recently had to buy again due to not holding anymore the charge. Head brush are easy to replace and very accessible in price. Excellent for kids with fine motor skills issues. It is overall, a very good investment to sustain your children's oral health.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana P.

customer_reviews.title: Interactive way for kids to brush their teeth
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've always had trouble getting my daughter to brush her teeth but with the help of this app she is actually waiting for the next time to brush her teeth. You get a little fuzzy guy that after you brush your teeth you get a little gift that has a new background, food to feed him and different colors that you can spray him. Super cute and really great interactive way to get kids to brush their teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good Toothbrush, Why isn't it shipped with compact head?
customer_reviews.text: I like the toothbrush, although I could do without the bluetooth connectivity. What bothers me is why is the compact head no longer included with the toothbrush? I bought one for my older child three years ago and got both sizes of heads. I just bought this one for my younger child and only the larger head is included. I didn't read the customer comments in advance and therefore didn't have the right toothbrush size on hand. Talk about disappointment for my little one!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: So the toothbrush is excellent, but was in no way prepared for how excited to brush his teeth my son would be. The app that comes with it is incredible! It's so cute and motivating that my son asks if he can brush his teeth extra time during the day... I'm not kidding, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley MacNeel

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Teeth For Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We started using this brush at age 2. And we’re still using it at age 3. My child likes this brush and it keeps her teeth clean. We supervise and her her since it is heavier than a traditional toothbrush. I would purchase it again and recommend to people with small children.
customer_reviews.author: Kbone

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. My son absolutely loves his toothbrush. The app brushes along with him as he is brushing his teeth. It also keeps track of when he brushes teeth. It's amazing to see how far we have come in technology.
customer_reviews.author: LaRonda Evans

customer_reviews.title: !!!!!  Delightfully Surprised  !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My initial thought was, "who needs an app for their toothbrush?" Boy, was I wrong! Everyday, twice a day, a fight used to erupt over brushing. This toothbrush arrived and made my life so much easier - it was an instant hit!!!! Now, brushing is a voluntary activity and my little one can't wait to show me what has been unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, educational and will make brushing fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these, the app makes brushing that much more fun. We both have the brand and got the kid version as we know them to be VERY efficient and reliable. The wireless app really does teach the kids to brush properly and makes brushing that much more fun. They come with multiple decals that can be changed over a period of time which is another wow factor kids love. I strongly recommend it if you’re considering.
customer_reviews.author: ItsBest

customer_reviews.title: Just ditch your other tooth brushes
customer_reviews.text: This should be the go-to for tooth brushes. Cute little stickers for the kids to customize their brush and it makes them look forward to brushing their teeth! Any time I ask my daughter, do you want to brush your teeth before or after your bath, she immediately brushes them and then into the bath. This tooth brush will mind control your kids into brushing their teeth on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Daughter doesnt like it
customer_reviews.text: 2 minute timer is not accurate and my daughter doesn’t like it because it is too intense. We’ve had other electric toothbrushes before and she enjoyed those. I have to beg her to use this one. Pairing with the app is nice
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Woods

customer_reviews.title: No More Fights!
customer_reviews.text: After lots of frustration around teeth brushing, we decided to get the Sonicare for kids. It has made a HUGE difference for our daughter's routine! She loves the app and her "Sparkly" baby! Unlike other reviewers, we have not had issues with the app and it really encouragers our daughter to brush. No more tears! No more frustration! We were wasting so much money on the battery operated toothbrushes and are glad we invested in this brush!
customer_reviews.author: sand yo

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last Long on 2 brush in a year!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these over the last year. This last one lasted 8 months and just stopped working. I am not buying any more of these. I would rather buy a $15 cheapy because it will probably outlast this $40 brush. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee C

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky clean teeth!
customer_reviews.text: After my husband and I bought a Sonicare toothbrush for ourselves, we knew our kids would benefit from one as well. I love the automatic timer with 30 second reminders to switch sections. You can use the app but most of the time we skip it since they are used to it by now. Great way to encourage maintaining healthy teeth with children!
customer_reviews.author: JohnsonPartyofFive

customer_reviews.title: False claim that it lasts for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product twice and each time it has lasted for less than one year. Users have to clean the dirt and grime it accumulates. If they do it loosens the screw and is not as firm as it was. If they don't, it becomes a very hygienic brush that should not be near anyone's mouth, let alone a kid's mouth. Phillips used to pride themselves in having a lifetime guarantee. Less than a year is just unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: ale

customer_reviews.title: Great kids toothbrush, just expect 12-18 months life!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the HX6340 two pack in Aug18. Worked very well until Apr20 when one toothbrush stopped charging, displaying rapid flashing LEDs. Our kids teeth were cleaner, the timer and stickers helped them brush better and more consistently. Replacement heads are cheap and available. Our experience based on other reviews is common. Great kids toothbrush, just expect a life of 12-18 months.
customer_reviews.author: flyjetguy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We have this toothbrush for two of our children. They both have braces and have a difficult time keeping their teeth clean. We have tried several cheaper electronic toothbrushes. Others are ok, but run out of batteries, get worn out, and clean ok. This does the job. They both have had excellent checkups since using Sonicare for Kids and need less help from us brushing. We are getting another for our 5 year old. As a bonus each can decorate the toothbrush how they like.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not only do my 7 year old’s teeth look so ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only do my 7 year old’s teeth look so much cleaner then they did when he was brushing them without an electric toothbrush, he really looks forward to brushing and is motivated to brush twice a day!!! As a mom, this is very excited. No more excuses from him since he uses the toothbrush app, gets to brush along with his fuzzy cute friend and earn virtual prizes. Wow! I do need to give him an extra minute before school and bed to brush along with his app, but it is more then worth it!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 9 year old, less plaque!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my 9 year old. It took a little time to get used to as it speeds up slightly after using it for a certain amount of time. He had to get used to it but has proven to have far less plaque and much cleaner teeth since starting this.
customer_reviews.author: Onefitmom

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush and so does my toddler. This toothbrush paired with the app has changed our brushing routine from a struggle to enjoyable. My daughter loves to take care of her sparkly, and we’re both excited to see what kind of “present” she will get after brushing. We have not missed a single brushing day or night since we received this toothbrush. I would buy this toothbrush fives times over to avoid the struggle and tantrums that used to occur at teeth brushing time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Banis

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it, so I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the Bluetooth on this so I can’t speak to it. My kids love their toothbrushes. The brushes come with cool sticker designs they can choose from to personalize it a bit. They like how it feels and there are 2 settings they can choose from. They also like the timer function and so I tell them less often to go back and brush again because they stop when the brush turns off. I wish I bought these sooner for my older kids.
customer_reviews.author: H.R. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Encourages brushing, so fun!
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush is awesome! We’ve had this for a couple of months, and my 4 year old still can’t wait to brush his teeth every day. It’s so fun. You can customize the toothbrush with stickers. Every time your child’s brushes his or her teeth, they win “prizes” (eg, a new background, food for the toothbrush friend, etc). Honestly, I wouldn’t mind having it for myself. It’s really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old would brush for about 10 seconds and claim that she was done. It was a constant struggle. Now, she ASKS to go brush her teeth and does so for the full 2 mins with the app and sometimes will even do it a second time! Definitely worth the money! Only downfall that I can think of is that I also bought one for my other daughter and the have to wait and take turns to use the app, but it honestly is not much of an issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I have one for each kid and they really help with getting them to brush and do it effectively. I've heard mixed reviews from friends about the accompanying app, but my kids love the virtual pet whose teeth you need to "brush" to get rewards. Our dentist remarked at our next visit after we got these (without knowing that we had) that the kids had significantly less plaque.
customer_reviews.author: Capital Mom

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush for my daughter. Pros: -She enjoys using it - she brushes for a lot longer now Cons: -replacement heads are pricey - like other reviewers, we had mold grow behind the stick-on plate. I caught it early and was able to just remove the plate. The sticker on it was cute, but my daughter doesn’t mind using this as a plain toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: LMGS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So much better then a regular toothbrush and its especially great that it's rechargeable - No more batteries to change :-). It's soft and just the right size for kids (have a 7 and 5 yrs old). Kids are enjoying the app that can be downloaded with the toothbrush and its great at teaching them the correct way to brush their teeth. The beeping sound lets them know when to move to the next section. It's a great interactive toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Biljana Juresic

customer_reviews.title: ... for our daughter who was begging for a toothbrush like ours! As soon as she saw it she ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter who was begging for a toothbrush like ours! As soon as she saw it she was so excited to set up, decorate, and use her new "big girl" toothbrush. I can honestly say that getting her to brush her teeth is no longer a fight, and she loves the timer that tells her when to switch sides. Easy to set up, easy to use. Very happy with our purchase. Only wish that It came with more than 1 brush. Would be nice if it came with atleast 1 replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: oh my gosh! It has never been easier to get my kiddo to brush his teeth. He LOVES the app and the little monster. He loves when he gets prizes and it that it shows him how to brush. It is totally a worthy investment.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great value, just large for a small kid
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised at how BIG this toothbrush is for kids. I thought it would somehow be smaller. That's the only thing I'd like to see improved. Kids want to do things themselves; my Toddler needs help because it's so big and heavy. It's too awkward for him to use it himself.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Nice when it works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them for my boys. 1 works fine and the other one is having difficulties. The brush head does not connect right and it makes a terrible buzzing sound. I bought these early for an Easter present and don’t see a way to return/exchange. For the one that does work, my 5 year old loves it and follows along with the app.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleB

customer_reviews.title: Mold!
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush would be awesome, though, a year+ after I purchased it, I noticed light mold then heavier mold within the electric part itself/the handle. Thus, mold slowly spreads to the brush as well overtime...
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Genius! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer! My 5 year old HATED brushing teeth. It was a struggle every night...until we bought this toothbrush. The app that you download to connect to the toothbrush is genius! My son now willingly brushes his teeth and is eager to see what prize he wins! Thank you!!! The app is WiFi enabled. Your child had a pet that brushes his teeth with them. It is timed for 2 minutes and they win virtual prizes for their pet when they compete the 2 minutes of brushing teeth.
customer_reviews.author: hapamama

customer_reviews.title: App is good incentive!
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old son really looks forward to brushing his teeth because of the sparkly app. It took some getting used to the brush, funny feeling but it has a slow mode so the kids can get accustomed to the brush. This tooth brush is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: LindaH

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this brush!
customer_reviews.text: After a few just soso visits to the dentist he recommended we get a decent but not overly expensive brush for our son. He sleeps with his mouth open because of allergies so the build up on his teeth no matter how well he brushes is bad. This brush however makes him brush longer! It also guides him as to where to brush his teeth. And he just loves playing with the sparkly on the app. Great idea Sonicare!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son wanted his own Sonic Care since we had them. Was hesitant at first because of the price but he loves it. The timer function is brilliant. I love that you can personalize the toothbrush with different stickers. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL CRAP
customer_reviews.text: It was a second toothbrush, first one ordered around Christmas. First was dead after 2 months so i was thinking, maybe a bad luck. didn't even bother with returns (cheap, you know ). So, the second one is dead after 2 moths too. DON'T BUY, waste of money and effort. JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Eduard Kasyanenko

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after several months...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Philip sonicare products for years, and I bought for all my family members. But this one for my daughter just stopped charging after used for several months. I should buy it in Costco where they usually accept return or refound easily.
customer_reviews.author: W.C

customer_reviews.title: Best Toothbrush Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Phillips Sonicare for Kids Bluetooth toothbrush is the best toothbrush I have ever bought for my child. It has made brushing much easier for her. We has been using this toothbrush for several months now. There is an app that you can download onto your device that has a cute character to keep kids attention. The app is interactive and shows kids where to hold their toothbrush in their mouth as well as making sure they are brushing long enough. Every time you reach a brushing goal the child gets a prize. The toothbrush itself is very sturdy and durable. The charge base works very fast. It also comes with different stickers to change the look of the toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Martissa Brassard

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for a 3 years old.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toothbrush last year but since than my daughter was afraid to use it. I stared to show her again how to use it better and not be afraid since she's 3 and a half now. She started using it and everytime we brush our teeth we call her to come with us.
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERY STURDY!!!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use, the metal post that the toothbrush head snaps onto became loose and started making the toothbrush head vibrate erratically (while on) because it wasn't fitting snugly on there. I'm surprised by this specially from Philips brand and upset that I can no longer return this item for a replacement. It's not even available any longer. What a waste of money for a kids toothbrush!!!
customer_reviews.author: LovebeamAri

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year - don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This lasted less than a year of daily use... it worked well, until last week when the motor went out and it only runs every few seconds. This toothbrush was not abused (his old one was used for several years, but we replaced it with this one). Disappointing, because Philips is usually pretty bankable. Our other children have had success with Braun (toddler version) and the FerryWill for an older child.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymously Me

customer_reviews.title: Keeps brushing fun
customer_reviews.text: Great way to keep kids teeth clean while they have a little fun. The stickers were a hit with my toddler and the vibration is more entertaining than a fixed brush. We were originally using an inexpensive Oral-B drugstore version, but found that the metal pieces were corroding when some got in his mouth. We feel much better about this option.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D McClane

customer_reviews.title: Must have for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 5 yr old son. It works perfectly. The timer helps him to tell when to stop brushing. It does make his teeth whiter than the regular toothbrush. Battery life- excellent. Only had to charged it every 2 weeks. Haven’t try the bluetooth- will update post once I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tteiah

customer_reviews.title: Toothbrush is stellar and the app is just as important
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush is awesome for kids and also for adults who think the adult version is too abrasive. Also, the cute app for kids is so awesome. Very motivating. The app is as important as the toothbrush! It teaches brushing techniques.
customer_reviews.author: Stepharoo

customer_reviews.title: Good brush, forget about the bluetooth though
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toothbrush, we've gone through a couple of these, each one has last about 3 1/2 years and usually dies after a trip. I'm guessing that airplane travel is traumatic for toothbrushes? The only challenge we run into with this one is that the bluetooth function is ridiculous, it doesn't work most of the time and the cartoon character on the app is too goofy even when it does work.
customer_reviews.author: mgspeed

customer_reviews.title: Interactive to get my kids brushing their teeth on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.text: First of all most Philips products are good. These are no exception, great product. My kids really like the app, it not only helps give them another visual on how to clean your teeth but it's interactive and gets them wanting to clean their teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Man

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toothbrush for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This brush has my children brushing twice a day and actually looking forward to it every time! They can't wait to check on their little friend on the app and get their rewards for brushing each time. Their teeth are so much whiter. I just bought my niece one for her birthday because I know she's going to love it as much as mine did. I know her parents will appreciate it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: wish all kids could have one!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for my 5 year old!! Makes brushing fun while doing a great job! As a dental hygienist I was thrilled to learn that they make Sonicare brushes for kids!! Would recommend to all parents!!! Yes it is expensive but this brush allows for a little bit more independence for young brushers. With their limited dexterity they truly cannot do an adequate job brushing. This brush does so much of the work that I do usually let her brush all by herself and I just monitor, once a day. Prevents gingivitis and gives littles the healthy smile they deserve!
customer_reviews.author: mamamica

customer_reviews.title: It hurts my little one's teeth
customer_reviews.text: The tooth brush works great. My little one loves the idea of having a big boy tooth brush. The only thing is he hates using it in the morning because he teeth are to sensitive :(. He tells me " Mommy its to much" with tears in his eyes. Sometimes he will use it at night.
customer_reviews.author: cathy crosbie

customer_reviews.title: After 1 month if use we started having vibration issues ...
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month if use we started having vibration issues. The vibrations started to come and go. It didn’t matter how long I charged it for. Eventually it stopped vibrating altogether when brushing. For some reason, the slightest tough to the bristles and all vibrations stop. Not able to return it, not able to use it either. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D.

product_meta.title: Philips Sonicare HX6321/02 Sonicare for Kids Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush, Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:AquaKeep kids engaged while they learn to brush. The Philips Sonicare for kids Bluetooth enabled toothbrush interacts with a fun app that helps kids brush better and for longer. Kids have fun while learning techniques that will last a lifetime.

BRAND STORY
By Philips
feature_bullets: 98 percent of parents say it's easier to get kids to brush longer and better with the interactive sonic power toothbrush
91 percent of dental professional parents prefer Sonicare for Kids for their own children
Interactive free app educates and gets kids excited about brushing. Kids are rewarded for each successful brushing session while parents can track and monitor progress
The kidpacer musically alerts when to move to the next quadrant of the mouth to ensure a thorough cleaning; Voltage: 110-220 V
The kidtimer gradually increase to 2 minutes to help train kids to brush for the dental professional recommended 2 minutes

specifications.Special Features: Bluetooth, Interactive free app educates and gets kids excited abour brushing.
specifications.Included Components: Handles: 1 Sonicare for Kids Bluetooth-enabled handle; Brush heads: 1 Sonicare for Kids standard; Charger:1; Stickers: 8 customization stickers, 2 Bonus stickers
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,228 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
